welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hoki, Japan! Immerse yourself in our charming city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and soak in all the beauty and culture our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miho Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Miho Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Izumo Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Izumo Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.
